name: Maggi Special Family Noodles
description: Maggi Family Pack - Provides a meal for the entire family and is fortified with Calcium which is essential for healthy bones and teeth. Tempered vegetables & meat to be added to make a hearty meal. Preparation - Boil sufficient water in pan. Add noodles and cook for two minutes. Strain the noodles. Temper with chopped vegetables, eggs, chicken, seafood or any other meat. Add salt to taste. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
